affixes.template: #% chance for each of your Keys to upgrade on completing a Floor

tiers.name: Enhancing
tiers.text: (3—4)% chance for each of your Keys to upgrade on completing a Floor

tiers.name: Reforging
tiers.text: (5—6)% chance for each of your Keys to upgrade on completing a Floor

tiers.name: Upgrading
tiers.text: (7—9)% chance for each of your Keys to upgrade on completing a Floor

affixes.template: #% chance if you were to lose all your Honour to have # Honour instead

tiers.name: Cheater's
tiers.text: (5—8)% chance if you were to lose all your Honour to have 1 Honour instead

tiers.name: Deceiver's
tiers.text: (9—12)% chance if you were to lose all your Honour to have 1 Honour instead

tiers.name: Resilient
tiers.text: Monsters deal 6% reduced Damage

tiers.name: Fortified
tiers.text: Monsters deal (7—8)% reduced Damage

tiers.name: Impenetrable
tiers.text: Monsters deal (9—12)% reduced Damage

affixes.template: Monsters have # reduced Attack, Cast and Movement Speed

tiers.name: Time-warping
tiers.text: Monsters have 4% reduced Attack, Cast and Movement Speed

tiers.name: Chronomancy
tiers.text: Monsters have 5% reduced Attack, Cast and Movement Speed

affixes.template: Monsters have #% reduced Attack, Cast and Movement Speed

tiers.name: Temporal
tiers.text: Monsters have (6—7)% reduced Attack, Cast and Movement Speed

tiers.name: Crushing
tiers.text: Monsters take (11—15)% increased Damage

tiers.name: Punishing
tiers.text: Monsters take (16—20)% increased Damage

tiers.name: Annihilating
tiers.text: Monsters take (21—30)% increased Damage

affixes.template: When you gain a Key #% chance to gain another

tiers.name: Pilferer's
tiers.text: When you gain a Key (7—9)% chance to gain another

tiers.name: Picklock's
tiers.text: When you gain a Key (10—12)% chance to gain another

tiers.name: Thief's
tiers.text: When you gain a Key (13—16)% chance to gain another

affixes.template: # additional Rooms are revealed on the Trial Map

tiers.name: of Illumination
tiers.text: (2—3) additional Rooms are revealed on the Trial Map

tiers.name: of Clairvoyance
tiers.text: 4 additional Rooms are revealed on the Trial Map

affixes.template: #% chance to Avoid gaining an Affliction

tiers.name: of Dignity
tiers.text: (6—7)% chance to Avoid gaining an Affliction

tiers.name: of Prestige
tiers.text: (8—9)% chance to Avoid gaining an Affliction

tiers.name: of Glory
tiers.text: (10—11)% chance to Avoid gaining an Affliction

tiers.name: of Honour
tiers.text: (12—15)% chance to Avoid gaining an Affliction

tiers.name: of Excellence
tiers.text: +(2—3)% to Maximum Honour Resistance

tiers.name: of Brilliance
tiers.text: +(4—5)% to Maximum Honour Resistance

affixes.template: Gain # Sacred Water when you complete a Room

tiers.name: of the Well
tiers.text: Gain (11—15) Sacred Water when you complete a Room

tiers.name: of the Fountain
tiers.text: Gain (16—20) Sacred Water when you complete a Room

tiers.name: of the Oasis
tiers.text: Gain (21—30) Sacred Water when you complete a Room

affixes.template: Restore # Honour on picking up a Key

tiers.name: of Donation
tiers.text: Restore (25—35) Honour on picking up a Key

tiers.name: of Offering
tiers.text: Restore (30—39) Honour on picking up a Key

tiers.name: of Entrusting
tiers.text: Restore (40—49) Honour on picking up a Key

tiers.name: of Bestowing
tiers.text: Restore (50—59) Honour on picking up a Key

tiers.name: of Bequeathing
tiers.text: Restore (60—75) Honour on picking up a Key

tiers.name: of Progress
tiers.text: Restore (10—14) Honour on room completion

tiers.name: of Advancement
tiers.text: Restore (15—19) Honour on room completion

tiers.name: of Headway
tiers.text: Restore (20—24) Honour on room completion

tiers.name: of Betterment
tiers.text: Restore (25—30) Honour on room completion
